reason: The orbit size bound s <= (6+n+k+m)/(4+n) is stated but the lower bound on |B| uses only {1,3,4,6,a_1,...,a_n}. This gives |B| >= 4+n. However, node 1.9 established that B contains supp(g_1) = {1,3,4,6,a_1,...,a_n}, which has size 4+n. The bound is correct but should clarify whether B might contain additional elements from b_i or c_i sets.
